20110109072941.000|20110109072943.000|CC1|>>> THE FOLLOWING IS A MESSAGE  
20110109072943.000|20110109072944.000|CC1|FROM NEW YORK MAYOR MICHAEL     
20110109072944.000|20110109072948.000|CC1|BLOOMBERG.                      
20110109072948.000|20110109072950.000|CC1|[ CHEERS AND APPLAUSE ]         
20110109072950.000|20110109072952.000|CC1|>> HELLO.                       
20110109072952.000|20110109072956.000|CC1|I'M MICHAEL BLOOMBERG.          
20110109072956.000|20110109072958.000|CC1|TWO WEEKS AGO TOMORROW ON       
20110109072958.000|20110109073000.000|CC1|DECEMBER 26th, NEW YORK CITY WAS
20110109073000.000|20110109073002.000|CC1|HIT BY WHAT WILL BE FOREVER     
20110109073002.000|20110109073002.000|CC1|CALLED THE GREAT BLIZZARD OF    
20110109073002.000|20110109073006.000|CC1|2010.                           
20110109073006.000|20110109073008.000|CC1|THE SNOW BEGAN TO FALL ON       
20110109073008.000|20110109073009.000|CC1|SUNDAY, AND BY THE TIME IT      
20110109073009.000|20110109073010.000|CC1|STOPPED THE NEXT DAY, THERE WAS 
20110109073010.000|20110109073015.000|CC1|SNOW EVERYWHERE.                
20110109073015.000|20110109073016.000|CC1|ON THE STREETS, ON THE GROUND,  
20110109073016.000|20110109073019.000|CC1|IN THE TREES, EVEN ON THOSE BIG 
20110109073019.000|20110109073020.000|CC1|ROCKS OR WHATEVER IN CENTRAL    
20110109073020.000|20110109073023.000|CC1|PARK.                           
20110109073023.000|20110109073025.000|CC1|IT WAS SO DEEP, SOME CITY       
20110109073025.000|20110109073027.000|CC1|RESIDENTS SAID, THEY COULDN'T   
20110109073027.000|20110109073029.000|CC1|EVEN SEE THE SIDEWALK IN FRONT  
20110109073029.000|20110109073031.000|CC1|OF THEIR APARTMENT UNTIL THE    
20110109073031.000|20110109073033.000|CC1|BUILDING SUPER SHOVELED IT.     
20110109073033.000|20110109073035.000|CC1|IT WAS, IN SHORT, A CATASTROPHE 
20110109073035.000|20110109073036.000|CC1|AND BROUGHT THIS CITY TO A      
20110109073036.000|20110109073039.000|CC1|COMPLETE STANDSTILL.            
20110109073039.000|20110109073040.000|CC1|TODAY AS WE CONTINUE TO DIG     
20110109073040.000|20110109073043.000|CC1|OURSELVES OUT FROM THIS HORROR, 
20110109073043.000|20110109073044.000|CC1|MANY NEW YORKERS ARE LEFT       
20110109073044.000|20110109073045.000|CC1|STUNNED, BEWILDERED AND OVERCOME
20110109073045.000|20110109073047.000|CC1|WITH FEELINGS OF DESPAIR AND    
20110109073047.000|20110109073049.000|CC1|HOPELESSNESS.                   
20110109073049.000|20110109073051.000|CC1|ABOVE ALL, WE HAVE QUESTIONS.   
20110109073051.000|20110109073053.000|CC1|WHERE DOES SNOW COME FROM?      
20110109073053.000|20110109073055.000|CC1|[ LAUGHTER ]                    
20110109073055.000|20110109073057.000|CC1|IS IT DANGEROUS?                
20110109073057.000|20110109073058.000|CC1|[ LAUGHTER ]                    
20110109073058.000|20110109073100.000|CC1|WILL THE SNOW STAY FOREVER?     
20110109073100.000|20110109073102.000|CC1|[ LAUGHTER ]                    
20110109073102.000|20110109073103.000|CC1|HOW DO I GET SNOW OFF MY CAR?   
20110109073103.000|20110109073106.000|CC1|[ LAUGHTER ]                    
20110109073106.000|20110109073107.000|CC1|AND WHAT HAPPENS IF SNOW TOUCHES
20110109073107.000|20110109073108.000|CC1|SUEDE?                          
20110109073108.000|20110109073111.000|CC1|[ LAUGHTER ]                    
20110109073111.000|20110109073113.000|CC1|REST ASSURED, MY OFFICE IS      
20110109073113.000|20110109073116.000|CC1|WORKING TO FIND ANSWERS TO THESE
20110109073116.000|20110109073117.000|CC1|QUESTIONS, AND MENTAL HEALTH    
20110109073117.000|20110109073118.000|CC1|PROFESSIONALS ARE STANDING BY TO
20110109073118.000|20110109073120.000|CC1|HELP THOSE WHO FIND THEMSELVES  
20110109073120.000|20110109073122.000|CC1|OVERWHELMED BY THE ENORMITY OF  
20110109073122.000|20110109073124.000|CC1|THIS EVENT.                     
20110109073124.000|20110109073126.000|CC1|IN THE MEANTIME, WE CONTINUE TO 
20110109073126.000|20110109073128.000|CC1|URGE ALL NEW YORKERS, AS WE HAVE
20110109073128.000|20110109073129.000|CC1|THROUGHOUT THIS CRISIS, NOT TO  
20110109073129.000|20110109073132.000|CC1|LEAVE YOUR APARTMENT UNLESS IT  
20110109073132.000|20110109073135.000|CC1|IS ABSOLUTELY ESSENTIAL.        
20110109073135.000|20110109073135.000|CC1|DON'T EVEN LOOK OUT YOUR        
20110109073135.000|20110109073138.000|CC1|WINDOWS.                        
20110109073138.000|20110109073139.000|CC1|[ LAUGHTER ]                    
20110109073139.000|20110109073141.000|CC1|SHOULD YOU RUN OUT OF FOOD,     
20110109073141.000|20110109073141.000|CC1|PLEASE DON'T TRY TO GO OUT AND  
20110109073141.000|20110109073142.000|CC1|GET SOME.                       
20110109073142.000|20110109073144.000|CC1|DON'T BE A HERO.                
20110109073144.000|20110109073146.000|CC1|[ LAUGHTER ]                    
20110109073146.000|20110109073147.000|CC1|SIMPLY CALL A RESTAURANT THAT   
20110109073147.000|20110109073149.000|CC1|DELIVERS, AND THE MEXICANS WILL 
20110109073149.000|20110109073151.000|CC1|BRING YOU FOOD.                 
20110109073151.000|20110109073154.000|CC1|[ LAUGHTER ]                    
20110109073154.000|20110109073157.000|CC1|NOW, THE BIG QUESTION, WHAT ARE 
20110109073157.000|20110109073158.000|CC1|WE DOING ABOUT REMOVING THE     
20110109073158.000|20110109073200.000|CC1|SNOW?                           
20110109073200.000|20110109073203.000|CC1|TONIGHT, I AM PLEASED TO REPORT 
20110109073203.000|20110109073204.000|CC1|THAT, EVEN AS WE SPEAK,         
20110109073204.000|20110109073205.000|CC1|THOUSANDS OF CITY SANITATION    
20110109073205.000|20110109073206.000|CC1|WORKERS ARE OUT IN THE PLOWS.   
20110109073206.000|20110109073209.000|CC1|THEY'RE NOT PLOWING YET.        
20110109073209.000|20110109073211.000|CC1|RIGHT NOW THEY'RE PLAYING CARDS.
20110109073211.000|20110109073213.000|CC1|THAT'S IN THEIR CONTRACT.       
20110109073213.000|20110109073215.000|CC1|AFTER THEY'RE DONE PLAYING      
20110109073215.000|20110109073216.000|CC1|CARDS, THEY'LL LOOK AT INTERNET 
20110109073216.000|20110109073218.000|CC1|PORN FOR AN HOUR OR SO, THEN    
20110109073218.000|20110109073220.000|CC1|STOP FOR LUNCH.                 
20110109073220.000|20110109073221.000|CC1|AFTER THAT COMES A TWO-HOUR     
20110109073221.000|20110109073223.000|CC1|BREAK.                          
20110109073223.000|20110109073225.000|CC1|THEN WE'LL SEND THEM HOME EARLY,
20110109073225.000|20110109073226.000|CC1|ALSO IN THEIR CONTRACT, BUT     
20110109073226.000|20110109073227.000|CC1|THEY'LL BE BACK AT NOON WHEN    
20110109073227.000|20110109073230.000|CC1|OVERTIME KICKS IN AND DO SOME   
20110109073230.000|20110109073232.000|CC1|SNOW REMOVAL FOR ABOUT AN HOUR, 
20110109073232.000|20110109073235.000|CC1|FOLLOWED BY A 90-MINUTE WORK    
20110109073235.000|20110109073236.000|CC1|STOPPAGE TO PROTEST DEPARTMENT  
20110109073236.000|20110109073239.000|CC1|LAYOFFS.                        
20110109073239.000|20110109073241.000|CC1|AFTER THAT THEY'LL BE EXTREMELY 
20110109073241.000|20110109073242.000|CC1|INTOXICATED, SO OUR ATTORNEYS   
20110109073242.000|20110109073244.000|CC1|HAVE ADVISED US JUST TO SEND    
20110109073244.000|20110109073246.000|CC1|THEM HOME EARLY, WITH PAY,      
20110109073246.000|20110109073248.000|CC1|RATHER THAN RISK THE LIABILITY. 
20110109073248.000|20110109073250.000|CC1|ON A RELATED NOTE, I AM PLEASED 
20110109073250.000|20110109073253.000|CC1|TO REPORT THAT 16th STREET      
20110109073253.000|20110109073254.000|CC1|BETWEEN 6th AND 7th AVENUES IS  
20110109073254.000|20110109073258.000|CC1|NOW COMPLETELY CLEAR OF SNOW.   
20110109073258.000|20110109073301.000|CC1|THAT'S BECAUSE OF A GAS         
20110109073301.000|20110109073303.000|CC1|EXPLOSION AND FIRE CAUSED BY ONE
20110109073303.000|20110109073305.000|CC1|OF OUR CITY SNOWPLOWS HITTING A 
20110109073305.000|20110109073306.000|CC1|PROPANE TRUCK.                  
20110109073306.000|20110109073307.000|CC1|[ LAUGHTER ]                    
20110109073307.000|20110109073309.000|CC1|AND LET ME ASSURE YOU THE DRIVER
20110109073309.000|20110109073311.000|CC1|IN QUESTION WHO WAS INTOXICATED 
20110109073311.000|20110109073312.000|CC1|WILL NOT BE AT THE WHEEL OF A   
20110109073312.000|20110109073314.000|CC1|PLOW AGAIN.                     
20110109073314.000|20110109073315.000|CC1|HE HAS BEEN PROMOTED TO         
20110109073315.000|20110109073316.000|CC1|SUPERVISOR.                     
20110109073316.000|20110109073318.000|CC1|[ LAUGHTER ]                    
20110109073318.000|20110109073320.000|CC1|BEFORE CONCLUDING, I WANT TO    
20110109073320.000|20110109073323.000|CC1|TAKE A MOMENT TO THANK EVERY NEW
20110109073323.000|20110109073324.000|CC1|YORKER FOR THEIR ASTONISHING    
20110109073324.000|20110109073327.000|CC1|COURAGE AND RESOLVE YOU HAVE    
20110109073327.000|20110109073328.000|CC1|DISPLAYED THROUGHOUT THIS ORDEAL
20110109073328.000|20110109073331.000|CC1|AND ALSO TO REMIND YOU THAT NO  
20110109073331.000|20110109073332.000|CC1|NATURAL DISASTER, EVEN ONE AS   
20110109073332.000|20110109073334.000|CC1|DEVASTATING AS THIS, IS EVER AN 
20110109073334.000|20110109073338.000|CC1|EXCUSE FOR DOMESTIC VIOLENCE, OR
20110109073338.000|20110109073341.000|CC1|FOR SMOKING.                    
20110109073341.000|20110109073343.000|CC1|AT SOME POINT, WE WILL OVERCOME 
20110109073343.000|20110109073345.000|CC1|THIS CRISIS.                    
20110109073345.000|20110109073347.000|CC1|HOWEVER LONG IT TAKES, HOWEVER  
20110109073347.000|20110109073350.000|CC1|MUCH IT COSTS, I PROMISE YOU, WE
20110109073350.000|20110109073353.000|CC1|WILL CLEAR NEW YORK CITY OF     
20110109073353.000|20110109073353.000|CC1|SNOW.
